channel.title: Need Source Help
channel.description:
The new source im trying runs great...until i compile it; same with my client. i wanted to upgrade to a 600+ server so i tried Rune(-)MTP 634 ( http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,514319.0.html ).
It starts off great but when i compile it, and then start it up again i get this error: [code=abap]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: org/dementhiu m/RS2Server : Unsupported major.minor version 51.0 at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClassCond(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$000(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: org.dementhium.RS2Server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
doesnt that mean it cant find the main class anymore? when it is obviously there?
this is the compiler it came with: [code=abap]@echo off title Compiler echo compiling.... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/mysql.jar;lib/netty-3.2.jar;lib/xstream.jar;lib/xpp.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/org/dementhium/RS2Server.java pause[/code]
this is the one i made: [code=abap]@echo off echo Compiling source... "C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.7.0_02/bin/javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/org/dementhium/*.java echo Complete pause[/code] Both do not work :confused: :confused: i have msn and teamviewer. thanks for your help and suggestions!

item.title: Need Source Help
item.dc:creator: @saltywalrus saltywalrus
item.description:
@saltywalrus wrote:

thank you anyways =/

can anyone else help?

Read full topic

@halflive9 wrote:

action
cache
content
event
identifiers
io
model
mysql
net
task
tools
util
GameExecuter.java
RS2Server.java[/quote]
Hmm i’m sorry. I can’t help you any further. I wish you goodluck on finding the solution.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Source Help
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

[quote=“saltywalrus, post:7, topic:431895”]your compiler did not work =/

and yes i believe that that is where the source files are.
and then like i said the cache is in data/cache
and i notice it also compiles the lib folder[/quote]

Could you check if it’s still src/org/dementhium or that the name dementhium has been changed?

item.title: Need Source Help
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

saltywalrus:

the cache is in Data/cache

okay, hmm I’ve never worked with 508+ servers so i’m trying my best.
src/org/dementhium
is this location in your source files? Or did you changed dementhium?

Else try to change your compiler with this.

@echo off
title Compiler
"C:/Program Files/Java\jdk1.6.0_02/bin/javac.exe"  -d ./bin ./*.java
pause

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

[quote=“saltywalrus, post:3, topic:431895”]im sorry i did not realize this, i am just really confused i have been tying to figure this out for 2 days =/

Edit: i changed it

yes my cache is in the correct folder spots, on my c drive[/quote]
C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.7.0_02/bin/javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/; -sourcepath src src/org/dementhium/.java

Your cache is located there? make sure the name is the same.

item.title: Need Source Help
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

[quote=“saltywalrus, post:1, topic:431895”]The new source im trying runs great…until i compile it; same with my client. i wanted to upgrade to a 600+ server so i tried Rune(-)MTP 634 ( http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,514319.0.html ).

It starts off great but when i compile it, and then start it up again i get this error:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: org/dementhiu m/RS2Server : Unsupported major.minor version 51.0 at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClassCond(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$000(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: org.dementhium.RS2Server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .

doesnt that mean it cant find the main class anymore? when it is obviously there?

this is the compiler it came with:

@echo off title Compiler echo compiling.... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/mysql.jar;lib/netty-3.2.jar;lib/xstream.jar;lib/xpp.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/org/dementhium/RS2Server.java pause

this is the one i made:

@echo off echo Compiling source... "C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.7.0_02/bin/javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/org/dementhium/*.java echo Complete pause
Both do not work
i have msn and teamviewer. and like i said if you help and are chill i could prob compensate?
thanks for your help and suggestions![/quote]
Is your cache located in your c:/ ?
Also paying people for coding help isn’t allowed. At moparscape we help you for free if you explain everything well to us and have respect for the members.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Source Help
item.dc:creator: @saltywalrus saltywalrus
item.description:
@saltywalrus wrote:

The new source im trying runs great…until i compile it; same with my client. i wanted to upgrade to a 600+ server so i tried Rune(-)MTP 634 ( http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,514319.0.html ).

It starts off great but when i compile it, and then start it up again i get this error:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: org/dementhiu m/RS2Server : Unsupported major.minor version 51.0 at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClassCond(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$000(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: org.dementhium.RS2Server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .

doesnt that mean it cant find the main class anymore? when it is obviously there?

this is the compiler it came with:

@echo off title Compiler echo compiling.... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/mysql.jar;lib/netty-3.2.jar;lib/xstream.jar;lib/xpp.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/org/dementhium/RS2Server.java pause

this is the one i made:

@echo off echo Compiling source... "C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.7.0_02/bin/javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/org/dementhium/*.java echo Complete pause
Both do not work
i have msn and teamviewer.
thanks for your help and suggestions!
